divs: Sighting DetailsThis object dimmed out then came to a complete stop and changed direction in a L form it would pulse flash a very bright light and the slowly dim..it look as if evey time it pulsed light it would pick up speed then as light got dim it looked as if it didnt move..so i pointed a 1 watt laser pointer at it and it stopped ...flashed 3 timesand picked up speed.. it never flashed in a pattern ..just random..but a slow fade to black after every flash..i have tracked satellites for years..this was out of this world as we know.
Summary: looked just like a slow moving satellite ..but then strobed a pure white flash and dimmed out
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Camden
There were no other sightings in Camden on or around June 1st 2012
